title: AWS EC2 Context
description: Contextual metadata for the Amazon Web Service EC2 platform.

ami_id.description: Amazon Machine Image (AMI) identifier that the instance was launched from

hostname.description: Hostname of the instance assigned by AWS. The operating system may report a different hostname based on configuration.

instance_id.description: The unique identifier for the EC2 instance

instance_type.description: The instance type of the EC2 image (for example, `t2.small`)

public_hostname.description: Public hostname assigned by AWS to the EC2 instance. The operating system may report a different hostname based on configuration.
